item.description:
This will get quite crowded so the best idea is for us to arrive as early as we can. I'm going to try and get there around 6 but might be a little late. It would be nice if we brought a bit of a picnic along and something to sit on. The show starts at 8.

PLease rsvp so we know what sort of splace we need to try and save.

I will email my cell phone out to those who rsvp so you can call and find us when you arrive.


If it rains head ot the 21st Amendment.

Cheers,
Amy

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Shakespeare Free in Boston Common
